article_title: Political Scene: R.I. pays millions to public relations staff, PR companies
article_text:
Political Scene: R.I. pays millions to public relations staff, PR companies

In a follow-up to last week's listing of the salaries paid to 53 state government press secretaries, Political Scene examines fees paid to private consultants and the salaries of those who handle PR for R.I.'s quasi-public agencies.
